# Gibb Sampling
```{r}
set.seed(12)
y <- 0.5
x <- 0
n <- 1000
m <- 20 # parameter for the binomial distribution
p <- 2
q <- 2

for (i in 1:n)
{
  x[i] <- rbinom(1, m, y[i])
  y[i+1] <- rbeta(1, x[i] + p, m - x[i] +q)
}
```
```{r}
y[1:20]
x[1:20]
```
```{r}
y[300:320]
x[300:320]
```

```{r}
x[800:820]
```
